name: Raees
writer: Rahul Dholakia, Harit Mehta, Neeraj Shukla, Ashish Vashi
review:
The only good takeaway from the movie is Nawazuddin's perfection. Else every aspect of Raees filmmaking lacks conviction. I would rather see Once upon a time in Mumbai again, instead of this scriptless usual smuggling flick.

Rating: 2 / 5

Storyline Rating: 2

Acting Rating: 3
Nawazuddin Siddiqui: 4
Mahira Khan: 3
Shah Rukh Khan: 3
Mohammed Zeeshan Ayyub: 3
